analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/11/0x87a963df987b3cdf0ee1a15a24438d006958665e.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0x87a963df987b3cdf0ee1a15a24438d006958665e.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0x87a963df987b3cdf0ee1a15a24438d006958665e.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
